issue.title: [C++] Native database client for MariaDB / MySQL client protocol
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3193](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3193). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Along with the theme of building optimized database client interfaces for Arrow users, it would be valuable to have such an add-on library for MariaDB/MySQL
